full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement

### Request for Proposal: Portable Dental Chair
#### Reference Number: WS4534820728

This tender announcement requests proposals from qualified suppliers to provide five (5) portable dental chairs to Statistics Canada for use as backup units during data collection for the Canadian Health Survey: Direct Measures (COHS). The contract period extends from the award date to one year after delivery and acceptance.

### Contract Details

* **Commodity/Service:** Dental Equipment
* **Procurement Category:** Goods
* **Procurement Method:** Competitive – Selective Tendering
* **Trade Agreements:** Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* **Regions of Delivery:** National Capital Region (NCR)
* **Expected Contract Start Date:** 2024-05-08
* **Expected Contract End Date:** 2025-05-27

### Mandatory Requirements

* Bidders must meet all mandatory requirements outlined in the Request for Proposal (RFP).
* The suppliers must deliver the portable dental chairs to Ottawa, ON within 12 weeks following the contract award.
* An option is available on the contract to purchase more portable dental chairs within two years following the contract award, including an extended warranty for up to two additional one-year periods per chair if the option is exercised.

### Tender Conditions

* The tender closing date is fixed as July 26, 2024 at 14:00 EDT.
* Only bids submitted by the specified deadline will be considered responsive.
* Bidders must provide all required supporting documentation and bid submissions must be submitted by the set closing time.
* Bids submitted after the specified deadline will result in the bid being declared non-responsive.

### Contact Information

* Name: Brazeau, Nadine (SPAC/PSPC)
* Email: nadine.brazeau@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

### Additional Information

The Request for Proposal (RFP) and associated documents can be accessed through the Ariba Discovery portal at [https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/20209977?extsite=MjAyMDk5NzdfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/20209977?extsite=MjAyMDk5NzdfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==). Note that all bids submitted through this portal must adhere to the specified deadlines.

Get in touch with Nadine Brazeau at nadine.bra
